nodes.text: The Hasiki system was located in the Northern Dependencies portion of the Inner Rim. It was home to the sentient Hasikian species and fell within the borders of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars of 22 BBY to 19 BBY.
The Hasiki system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-8.
